componentInstanceProperties.name: messageBody
componentInstanceProperties.value: The NPS document has not yet been generated. Please click the Generate NPS button above and the PDF will be automatically attached to the record.

componentInstanceProperties.name: messageBody
componentInstanceProperties.value: This usually takes less than 20 seconds and you will be notified via email when it's done. You can then refresh the page to find the completed document attached.

componentInstanceProperties.name: messageBody
componentInstanceProperties.value: This NPS Survey has Responses associated to it but is not yet submitted. Please complete the NPS Survey Submission.

componentInstanceProperties.name: messageBody
componentInstanceProperties.value: The NPS Report has been generated for this record. Please check the Attachments below.
